command.name: OCR active file into annotation file
command.description: process the currently selected file and write the extracted text into an annotation file.

inputConfigurations.name: template
inputConfigurations.value:
---
date: "{{ "now" | date: "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M" }}"
tags: ocr, taskbone
---

# {{ imageFileBaseName }}
![[{{ imageFilePath }}]]

{{ text }}

command.name: OCR image and insert at cursor position
command.description: OCR image and insert text at curser position

inputConfigurations.name: template
inputConfigurations.value: {{ text }}

command.name: OCR Math image and insert at cursor position
command.description: OCR Math image and insert text at curser position

inputConfigurations.name: template
inputConfigurations.value: {{ text }}

command.name: Sync with Todoist (tasks-style)
command.description: Pushes new tasks to Todoist and syncs state in both directions.

inputConfigurations.name: level
inputConfigurations.value: {% assign spaces = task | findAll: '(?<=^[\\s]*)[\\s]+?' %}{{ spaces | size }}

inputConfigurations.name: state
inputConfigurations.value: {% assign x = task | findOne: '\\[[xX ]\\]' %}{% if x == '[ ]' %}open{% else %}resolved{% endif %}

inputConfigurations.name: description
inputConfigurations.value: [Link to Obsidian](obsidian://open?vault={{ vaultName | url_encode }}&file={{ filePath | url_encode}})

inputConfigurations.name: labelNames
inputConfigurations.value: {% assign labels = task | findAll: '(?<=[\\t ]*[#])([^\\s:#,.])+(?![\\S]*::)' %}{{ labels | json }}

inputConfigurations.name: todoistId
inputConfigurations.value: {{ task | findOne: '(?<=https:\\/\\/todoist.com\\/showTask\\?id=)\\d*' }}

inputConfigurations.name: updateTemplate
ignoreFieldsOnUpdate
inputConfigurations.value:
{
  "title": true,
  "description": true,
  "labels": true,
  "dueDate": true,
  "project": true,
  "parent": false,
  "state": false
}

inputConfigurations.name: priority
inputConfigurations.value: {% if task contains "⏫" %}4{% elsif task contains "🔼" %}3{% endif %}

command.name: Import tasks into current daily note
command.description: Import Todoist tasks due on the day of the currently active daily note

inputConfigurations.name: filter
inputConfigurations.value: due: {% assign split = fileBaseName | split: '-' %}{{ split[1] }}/{{ split[2] }}/{{ split[0] }}

inputConfigurations.name: template

command.name: Sync project tasks
command.description: Sync based on the 'Project' defined in the frontmatter

inputConfigurations.name: filter
inputConfigurations.value: {% if metadata.frontmatter.Project %}#{{ metadata.frontmatter.Project }}{% else %}#Inbox{% endif %}

inputConfigurations.name: level
inputConfigurations.value: {% assign spaces = task | findAll: '(?<=^[\\s]*)[\\s]+?' %}{{ spaces | size }}

inputConfigurations.name: state
inputConfigurations.value: {% assign x = task | findOne: '\\[[xX ]\\]' %}{% if x == '[ ]' %}open{% else %}resolved{% endif %}

inputConfigurations.name: description
inputConfigurations.value: [Obsidian](obsidian://open?vault={{ vaultName | url_encode }}&file={{ filePath | url_encode}})

inputConfigurations.name: projectName
inputConfigurations.value: {% if metadata.frontmatter.Project %}{{ metadata.frontmatter.Project }}{% else %}Inbox{% endif %}

inputConfigurations.name: labelNames
inputConfigurations.value: {% assign labels = task | findAll: '(?<=[\\t ]*[#])([^\\s:#,.])+(?![\\S]*::)' %}{{ labels | json }}

inputConfigurations.name: dueDate
priority
inputConfigurations.value: {% if task contains "⏫" %}4{% elsif task contains "🔼" %}3{% endif %}

inputConfigurations.name: todoistId
inputConfigurations.value: {{ task | findOne: '(?<=https:\\/\\/todoist.com((\\/showTask\\?id=)|(\\/app\\/task\\/)))\\d*' }}

inputConfigurations.name: updateTemplate
ignoreFieldsOnUpdate
inputConfigurations.value:
{
  "title": true,
  "description": true,
  "labels": true,
  "dueDate": true,
  "project": true,
  "parent": false,
  "state": false
}

command.name: Import Todoist tasks (tasks-style)
command.description: Import Todoist tasks due today or overdue at cursor position

inputConfigurations.name: filter
inputConfigurations.value: (today | overdue)

inputConfigurations.name: template

command.name: OCR selected and insert at cursor position
command.description: OCR image and insert text at curser position

inputDefinitions.name: template
inputDefinitions.description: The template to format the text.
